title.narrative: Pak Flood - Early Recovery Grants to Multilaterals

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides support for early recovery activities following the July 2010 floods in Pakistan. The floods affected 84 out of a total of 121 districts across Pakistan. Under this initiative contributions are given to various multilateral organisations including the United Nations (UN), Food and Agriculture Organisation (FAO), World Health Organisation (WHO) and the World Food Programme (WFP), in accordance with critical sectors outlined as underfunded in the Pakistan Flood Emergency Response Plan of September 2010. These multilateral organisation will use the funds to support various activities in the health, education, agriculture and livelihoods and food security sectors. The total value of this initiative is $16.3 million expensed during the 2010-11 financial year.
